    • Method Detail

      • mustBeVerb

        public boolean mustBeVerb(java.lang.String word,
                 java.sql.Connection conn,
                 java.lang.String prefix)
        word must be a verb if 1. its pos is "verb" only, or 2. "does not" word 3. has "verb" pos and seen patterns (word "a/the", or word prep ) and not seen pattern (word \w+ly$).
